title: FOX EUROPE PRESENTS HAPPY RIDE 2013
description:
Fox sponsored La Poma Bike Park in Barcelona and what a great show this year for Happy Ride Weekend. There was an amazing turnout with a great bunch of riders and fans. We made this edit to give you a taste of the event.

Music:
Band: Work drugs
Song: Young lungs
